table.name: IAMOAuthAppGroup
table.description: The Segrigate space for OAuth users.

column.name: OAUTH_APP_GROUP_ID
column.description: ID of the third party Space created

column.name: OAUTH_APP_GROUP_NAME
column.description: Name of the third party Space created

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: Reference of AppAccount orgType/ ServiceOrg OrgType

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this Oauth type.

table.name: IAMOAuthClient
table.description: The list of OAuth clients registerd to Zoho

column.name: CLIENT_NAME
column.description: Name of the third party client or Zoho Service

column.name: CLIENT_ID
column.description: An unique ID for the client genrated by Zoho. This will be exposed to the client. The clinet communicates with Zoho using this ID. This ID can be exposed by the clinet. This is not a secret value

column.name: CLIENT_SECRET
column.description: This is the client secret. The value of this should be kept secret by the client. This will be used on token exchange on web-server profile.

column.name: CLIENT_ZID
column.description: This is for internal purpose. The AccessGrant table in "Account" space will have a mapping of this CLIENT_ZID. We cannot put CLIENT_ID or AUTO_ID as they may be changeable

column.name: CLIENT_DOMAIN
column.description: Domain used by the client. The token will be sent only to the registered domain. It can be a regular expression for ZohoService.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: STATUS
column.description: The status of the client. Can be 1 - Enabled, 0 - Disabled

column.name: CLIENT_TYPE
column.description: 1- External User , 2- SSO Mobile App , 3 - Mobile App, 4- Internal Org App

column.name: IS_RESTRICTED
column.description: 0-normal client, 1-org client 2-restricted org client

column.name: HOME_PAGE_URL
column.description: HomePageURl used by the client

column.name: PRIMARY_DC
column.description: Comma seperated dc like us,eu like

column.name: LAST_PRIMARY_SYNC_TIME
column.description: Last time at which the data is synced from primary DC. This is to avoid any sync missmatch sue to communication error.

table.name: IAMOAuthKeyPair
table.description: The list of OAuth clients registerd to Zoho

column.name: KEY_ID
column.description: Name of the third party client or Zoho Service

column.name: KEY_TYPE
column.description: Type of key pair Ex : OAuth : 0 , IAMAgent : 1

column.name: ALGORITHM
column.description: Algorithm used for key pair generation and validation

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key to share to user.

column.name: PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: Private key to sign/encrypt.

table.name: IAMAuthtoOAuth
table.description: This table will contain authscopes to oauthscopes mapping for external client.

column.name: CLIENT_ID
column.description: An unique ID for the client genrated by Zoho. This will be exposed to the client. The clinet communicates with Zoho using this ID. This ID can be exposed by the clinet. This is not a secret value

column.name: AUTHTOKENSCOPES
column.description: comma separated Authtoken scopes

column.name: OAUTHTOKENSCOPES
column.description: comma separated OAuthtoken scopes

column.name: CLIENT_STATUS
column.description: Client status - blocked/allowed , blocked - 0, allowed - 1

column.name: TOKEN_EXPIRY_TIME
column.description: ISC/AUTHTOKEN EXPIRY TIME IN NUMBER OF DAYS - allowed range 1 to 7

table.name: IAMAuthTokenDeletion
table.description: Once auth to oauth mapping is done this table will contain authtoken and its expired value.

table.name: IAMOAuthClientScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

column.name: SCOPE_TYPE
column.description: User for identifing the group scope. 1 - service scope. 2 - Group scope

table.name: IAMOAuthOpenId
table.description: OAuth Open Id for email scope

column.name: OPEN_ID
column.description: Unique ID for User for Client

table.name: IAMOAuthClientRedirectURL
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: REDIRECT_URL
column.description: The redirect URI of the client. If the domain is not specified the oAuth redirect_uri param will be verified with the REDIRECT_URI

column.name: REDIRECT_URL_APL
column.description: Redirect URI's APL.

column.name: REDIRECT_URL_TYPE
column.description: Type of the URI, wheather it is javascript uri or Applocation redirect URI. 1- server Url, 2 - javascript url

table.name: IAMOAuthGrantToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: USER_ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: GRANT_TOKEN
column.description: Grant token for getting access token.

column.name: GRANT_TYPE
column.description: Type of the Grand token.

column.name: REDIRECT_URL
column.description: Redirect URL used to generate grant token.

column.name: ACCESS_TYPE
column.description: The status of the client. Can be 1 - Ofline access, 0 - accessTokenAlone

column.name: GRANT_TOKEN_INFO
column.description: Used to store other information about the grant Token.

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: OrgType for OrgOAuthToken Management

table.name: IAMOAuthGrantTokenScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthGrantTokenOrgInfo
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed ServiceOrg/App-Account details for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Store ZSOID or ZAAID depending on the user.

column.name: ZIDTYPE
column.description: Service-Org=0, App-Account=1

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Service name of the ZID

table.name: IAMOAuthRefreshToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: USER_ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: REFRESH_TOKEN
column.description: Refresh token of the user for this client

column.name: DEVICE_NAME
column.description: For mobile clients. Used for display purpose

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: OrgType for OrgOAuthToken Management

table.name: IAMOAuthRefreshTokenScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthRefreshTokenOrgInfo
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed ServiceOrg/App-Account details for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Store ZSOID or ZAAID depending on the user.

column.name: ZIDTYPE
column.description: Service-Org=0, App-Account=1

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Service name of the ZID

table.name: IAMOAuthRefreshTokenKey
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: KEY_NAME
column.description: Key id to identify the key.

column.name: KEY_VALUE
column.description: Key value to do operation.

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: USER_ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: REFRESH_TOKEN
column.description: Refresh token of the user for this client

column.name: ACCESS_TOKEN
column.description: Access token for getting access to the client resource.

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessTokenScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessTokenOrgInfo
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed ServiceOrg/App-Account details for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Store ZSOID or ZAAID depending on the user.

column.name: ZIDTYPE
column.description: Service-Org=0, App-Account=1

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Service name of the ZID

table.name: IAMOAuthDeviceToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: USER_ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID. Will be updated during verify code.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: DEVICE_TOKEN
column.description: Grant token for getting access token.

column.name: GRANT_TYPE
column.description: Type of the Grand token.

column.name: VERIFICATION_CODE
column.description: Verification code shown to the user.

column.name: VERIFICATION_STATUS
column.description: Indicates wheather the code is verified or not. 0 - pending, 1- approved, 2 - denied

column.name: ACCESS_TYPE
column.description: The status of the client. Can be 1 - Ofline access, 0 - accessTokenAlone

column.name: USER_LOCATION
column.description: For cross dc handling. location will be updated only on success

table.name: IAMOAuthDeviceTokenScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthDeviceTokenOrgInfo
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Store ZSOID or ZAAID depending on the user.

column.name: ZIDTYPE
column.description: Service-Org=0, App-Account=1

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Service name of the ZID

table.name: IAMOAuthKeys
table.description: The list of OAuth Keys used for for signing.

column.name: KEY_ID
column.description: Name of the third party client or Zoho Service

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key to share to user.

column.name: PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: Private key to sign/encrypt.

table.name: IAMOAuthApiToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: API_KEY
column.description: Grant token for getting access token.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: Describtion of token generated.

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: OrgType for orgapikey validations

table.name: IAMOAuthApiTokenScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthInternalApiToken
table.description: This table will contain internal api token details like handeshakeid for inactive apikey creation.

column.name: TOKEN_NAME
column.description: Key id to identify the key.

column.name: TOKEN_VALUE
column.description: Key value to do operation.

table.name: IAMOAuthClientProperties
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

table.name: IAMOAuthInternalToken
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: TOKEN_NAME
column.description: Key id to identify the key.

column.name: TOKEN_VALUE
column.description: Key value to do operation.

table.name: IAMOAuthDcDigest
table.description: Holds digests that help authenticate openid/oauth users across different data centers

column.name: DIGEST
column.description: The digest generated for this particular open id

column.name: LOCATION
column.description: The location returned from DL server

table.name: IAMOAuthDcDetails
table.description: Holds API enbaled in various data center for this Users

column.name: DC_LOCATION
column.description: The digest generated for this particular open id

table.name: IAMOAuthJavaScriptDomains
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: DOMAIN
column.description: The redirect URI of the client. If the domain is not specified the oAuth redirect_uri param will be verified with the REDIRECT_URI

column.name: DOMAIN_APL
column.description: Redirect URI's APL.

table.name: IAMOAuthMobileAppService
table.description: Mobile App Service Name

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Mobile App Service Name

table.name: IAMOAuthMobileAppName
table.description: Mobile App Name

column.name: MOBILE_APP_NAME
column.description: Mobile App Name

column.name: APP_LOGO
column.description: Logo of app

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description to be shown to user from ZOHO ONE app

column.name: APP_TYPE
column.description: Catagorizing the app to MobileAppType

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Mobile App Display Name

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique Id for Cross DC Sync

table.name: IAMOAuthMobileDevices
table.description: list of mobile devices in different platforms

column.name: PACKAGE_NAME
column.description: Package name under which mobile is released

column.name: OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
column.description: ID under which App is registered under OAuth.

column.name: CLIENT_ZID
column.description: For ARM to fetch client details via IAM3 api call

column.name: CLIENT_TYPE
column.description: Development = 0, Production = 1, MDM = 2

column.name: APP_TYPE
column.description: Android=0 , IOS=1 , Windows=2

column.name: SIGNATURE
column.description: Signature of the mobile app.

table.name: IAMOAuthMobileDevicesDetails
table.description: mobile app device details

column.name: APP_CLIENT_ID
column.description: Google/Ios Client Id given to an app.

column.name: PROJECT_ID
column.description: Devlepor console Id used for reference.

column.name: AUDIENCE_ID
column.description: Registerted AUDIENCE ID from google.

table.name: IAMOAuthClientAccessIp
table.description: OAuth Open Id for email scope

column.name: NAME
column.description: Name of the IP / IP Range. Ex: Chennai Office, US Office, IAN Network, etc

column.name: FROM_IP
column.description: From IP Address of the range.

column.name: TO_IP
column.description: To IP Address of the range. In case of single IP Address, this column will be null.
